thread.title: Manchester United transfer news and rumours: Red Devils to miss out on Lazio striker Keita Balde Diao?
thread.title_full: Manchester United transfer news and rumours: Red Devils to miss out on Lazio striker Keita Balde Diao?

author: James Whaling
title: Manchester United transfer news and rumours: Red Devils to miss out on Lazio striker Keita Balde Diao?
text:
Share this video Watch Next 
Jose Mourinho has ruled out adding a defender to his Manchester United squad in this month’s transfer window. 
United have been linked with January moves for Southampton’s Jose Fonte and Benfica’s Victor Lindelof, with Mourinho looking to strengthen his defence. 
And with Eric Bailly now absent for at least a month on African Cup of Nations duty with Ivory Coast, United’s defensive options will be stretched, writes Mirror Football's David McDonnell. 
But Mourinho revealed he has no plans to enter the market for a defender, placing his faith in Phil Jones, Marcos Rojo and Chris Smalling. Schneiderlin and Depay won't play again, says Mourinho The pair have both been linked with Everton (Photo: Getty Images) 
Morgan Schneiderlin and Memphis Depay will not play for Manchester United again, according to Jose Mourinho. 
Both midfielders have been told they can leave United, with Mourinho refusing to select them while their futures remain unresolved in this month's transfer window, writes Mirror Football's David McDonnell. 
Everton and West Brom have both bid for Schneiderlin, but have fallen well short of United's £20million valuation of the France midfielder. 
Memphis has also attracted interest from Everton and Turkish side Fenerbahce, but he and Schneiderlin will not be considered for selection while they are up for sale. Read More
